actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet, Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.

summary.text: Amends the River and Harbor Act of 1962 to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to pay the city of Virginia Beach, Virginia, for certain remedial work the city did as a result of the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet, Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet, Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.
